Om mig

Personen bakom bloggen

Hello!

My name is Morgan and I'm a psychologist with a special interest in statistics and psychometrics. Please have a look at some stuff I've done in the links at the bottom!

I work at Cubiks, an international assessment and development consultancy. Being a part of the products team, my main focus is on ensuring high quality of our tests and solutions.

I've previously been working as a clinical psychologist at the Habilitation Centre, and with test development at Pearson Assessment. My experience in psychological assessment comes from both research and practice.

I grew up in the countryside near Linköping, and currently live in Birkastan, Stockholm. I graduated with a Master's degree from the Psychologist Programme with an orientation toward Sports at Umeå university in 2012.

My Master's thesis was a randomized controlled trial of an online intervention for depression. The paper is now published in a peer-reviewed scientific journal, available online for free. The data and analyses in R-code are also openly available on datadryad.org.

To get in touch, click any of the icons below or the button "Kontakt" on the top!
